programme.title: A Minute to Pray, a Second to Die
programme.desc: In Tuscola, New Mexico, the Governor offers amnesty papers to all outlaws but gunfighter Clay McCord's appearance triggers a violent confrontation between the local marshal, McCord, and other outlaws.

programme.title: Requiescant
programme.desc: The adopted son of a preacher comes upon a village that is under the thumb of a deranged ex-Confederate officer, who is - among other things - stealing land from the locals with phony land grants.

programme.title: Sabata the Killer
programme.desc: Sabata and Mangosta are bank robbers, who after a bank job, through a series of events, end up teaming up with the bank clerk, Peter. They then go on the run with Peter's boss and a hired posse equipped with the latest technology in weapons on their trail.

programme.title: The Restless Breed
programme.desc: After Mitch Baker’s father is killed by gun-runners, he follows them to Mexico for revenge. In the border town of Mission, Texas, Mitch faces off with gang leader Jim Simmons, determined to take justice into his own hands, despite warnings from the sheriff.

programme.title: Gunfight at Red Sands
programme.desc: An avenging outsider riddles a gang of ruthless bandits in revenge for the murder of his family.

programme.title: Djurado
programme.desc: Djurado is a gun-slinging professional gambler who struts into the small town of Silver Mine and wins half of the local saloon, the other part of which belongs to Barbara, whilst battling notorious outlaw Tucan.

programme.title: Three Ruthless Ones
programme.desc: The Walker brothers took different paths—one an outlaw, one a Marshal, one a rancher. Yet they share one goal: avenging their father’s murder. When they finally find the killer, their clashing ideals lead to a deadly showdown.

programme.title: They Called Him Trinity
programme.desc: An ex-sheriff sets out to find the bandits who beat and murdered his sister.

programme.title: Django Challenges Sartana
programme.desc: Framed for a bank robbery, bounty killer Django's brother, Steve is lynched.

programme.title: Raise Your Hands, Dead Man, You're Under Arrest
programme.desc: The sole survivor, named Sando Kid (Peter Lee Lawrence), of a massacre in the North seeks revenge. After suffering the atrocity, the Kid executes a solo revenge, razes, beats and kills everyone involved in the massacre.

programme.title: Kill Johnny Ringo!
programme.desc: Johnny Ringo, a Texas Ranger, tracks down a counterfeiting ring, but the real challenge is a love triangle involving rancher Ray Scott, his sister Christine, saloon singer Annie, and gang boss Jackson. As Ringo tries to stop the counterfeiters, he learns the sheriff, his own partner, is behind it all, complicating the mission.

programme.title: Django Kill... If You Live, Shoot!
programme.desc: Various factions, feud over stolen gold in a surreal town.

programme.title: The White, the Yellow and the Black
programme.desc: In the 19th century, when the Japanese Emperor sends a gift pony to the US President it gets stolen and ransomed by Indians but Sheriff Gideon aided by an inept Japanese servant offers to deliver the ransom.

programme.title: Western Kid
programme.desc: Andrea Balestri has dubbed himself Kid Terror O’Hara, leader of a group of children who head to the ghost town of Torque to play cowboy games.
